documents.document: @ellen_pilsworth That's pretty much my story too. I'd love to see you next time I'm in London x

Things are getting worse and worse for Theresa May. Can't believe the poor thing has to have a "special relationship" with Donald Trump 😫

Ruth Negga is my favourite Irish actress.
https://t.co/LaAKOxjfON
@laurahannawhite @magicgoeshere you're always finding cats. One time when I was at your house there were 12 of them in your garden
@Southldntabby @GrainneClear We're like a secret society with code names. It confuses the non-Irish speakers. Ha!
@Southldntabby @GrainneClear Grá have you watched either of the Allstar seasons? If not you have 4!. And then S9 will be out in March right?
@Southldntabby She's incredibly sweet! How unfair is it that @GrainneClear is only beginning S7? So jealous she has two seasons to go.
@Southldntabby Awh lil Trixie! She's a pet. Did you see her adorable message to Kim Chi in Untucked?
@Southldntabby Mine in order: 1. Jinkx, 2. Violet 3. Latrice 4. Alyssa 5. Sharon. Bonus Alaska. I'm old school! None after S5 except Violet
@Southldntabby NO really?
@Southldntabby sickening death drop tho
@Southldntabby I know she's a pet and everything but.. I just can't. I think it's the "props to ya mamma"
@GrainneClear @michellevisage she's so quotable ❤️❤️❤️ "I think ratchet footnotes are your thing"
@Southldntabby your lip sync to stream of consciousness was more Dorothy Gale than Dorothy Richardson. Shasay away
Last night I dreamt that @michellevisage was my external examiner for my PhD and she didn't think my dissertation was polished enough 😭
Why does everyone outside Ireland insist on doing this? 😭 https://t.co/6ihX4jaeBV

@CathalWogan I think we're talking the same language. Our hypothetical future dogs deserve nothing but the utmost respect.
@CathalWogan My dog will be named The Good King Mugglewump.
@CathalWogan Full names I can deal with. Giving them full names somehow acknowledges that they are better than us.
I hate when dogs have human names.Paul. Paul is not a dog's name. Paul is the name of someone who worries about tax hikes. Not for a beagle.
@JoeyKavanagh_ YAY. She's my number one. Then comes Alyssa, Latrice, Violet, and Alaska. Bonus is Kim Chi. But all of them are wonderful.
@JoeyKavanagh_ She is such a beautiful soul! Monsoon season every season.
Well I don't know what I was expecting really. https://t.co/BdWm3xLMEI
@Barry_Smith_79 often marginalises them further. Personally I don't think that's right. But you are entitled to your opinion of course. 2/2
@Barry_Smith_79 I'm not sure they're trying to tell you how to think.They're acknowledging that hurtful opinions about minorities 1/2
@Barry_Smith_79 Fair enough, but with respect, if your opinion harms others then there probably is something a little off. Peace x
